channel.title: Software on Aaron J. Olson's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Aaron J. Olson's Blog

item.title: List of Software I Keep on My Computers
item.description: In the event that I have to replace a computer, these are the software packages that I get (in the order I need them) Google Chrome Sublime text Pycharm Evernote Git (and Gitbash if I’m on windows) 7zip Visual studio code Krita Openshot Audacity OBS Handbrake FFMPEG Youtube-dl Spotify Docker WinDirStat (grand perspecive on OSX) For Video Game Work Blender Unity3D Zbrush 4 (If I need to do some serious 3D work) Razer Cortex (Windows only)
